message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations, considering its potential worth to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. Considering the product's value to you is $800,000, I'm willing to offer $900,000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that benefits both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the gap between our valuations is still significant.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your interest.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. Considering your initial offer was $1,100,000 and you've come down to $1,050,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer $1,025,000. I think this is a fair compromise that takes into account the value of the product.
